objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor slab made of smooth matte material in a neutral light grey finish, forming the base of the booth. It spans a large square area to comfortably accommodate a life-size demonstration car and pathways for visitors, with a subtle bevel along all edges for a clean professional look.

A vertical partition wall in neutral light grey with seamless flat panels, forming the front boundary of the booth. It extends floor to ceiling and features a smooth matte surface to provide a clean backdrop.
A vertical rear wall in neutral light grey with flat seamless panels, forming the back boundary of the booth. It spans full height and width, providing structural enclosure.
A left side wall in neutral light grey, constructed from flat panels with a smooth matte finish. It runs floor to ceiling, framing the space and guiding visitor flow.
A right side wall in neutral light grey, formed by smooth seamless panels. It closes the rectangular booth space and complements the overall minimalist design.

A full-size demonstration car with a sleek aerodynamic body, glossy white paint finish, tinted windows, and realistically detailed wheel rims. It features precision modelling of door handles, side mirrors, grille and LED headlights to convey a premium appearance.

A reception desk crafted from polished wood panels with a glossy finish, featuring a spacious countertop for two staff members. It has an L-shaped modern profile, integrated subtle RGB accent lighting along the base, and concealed storage compartments behind the front fascia.

A tall vertical banner stand with a slim metal frame and tensioned fabric graphic panel, featuring vibrant car brand logo and promotional imagery in bold RGB colors. The base is weighted for stability and the graphic surface is matte to reduce glare.

A matching vertical banner stand with slim metal framing and tensioned fabric display, showcasing promotional graphics and brand logo in vibrant RGB tones. It has a stable weighted base and a non-reflective surface for optimal visibility.

A ceiling-mounted spotlight with a conical housing in matte black finish, fitted with a focused beam lamp. It projects a crisp white light to accentuate the demo car below, and includes adjustable tilt for precise targeting.
A matching ceiling-mounted spotlight with matte black conical housing and focused beam lamp. It casts a bright white light onto the demonstration car, enhancing its contours and glossy finish.
A small round discussion table with a brushed metal pedestal base and a natural wood tabletop featuring a smooth lacquered finish, sized to comfortably seat two visitors.
A modern visitor chair with an ergonomic molded seat and backrest, tubular metal legs, and dark fabric upholstery for a sleek minimalist aesthetic.
A modern visitor chair with an ergonomic molded seat and backrest, tubular metal legs, and dark fabric upholstery for a sleek minimalist aesthetic.
A small round discussion table with a brushed metal pedestal base and a natural wood tabletop featuring a smooth lacquered finish, sized to comfortably seat two visitors.
A modern visitor chair with an ergonomic molded seat and backrest, tubular metal legs, and dark fabric upholstery for a sleek minimalist aesthetic.
A modern visitor chair with an ergonomic molded seat and backrest, tubular metal legs, and dark fabric upholstery for a sleek minimalist aesthetic.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a textured ceramic pot in neutral tones, adding a natural accent to the seating corner.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a textured ceramic pot in neutral tones, adding a natural accent to the seating corner.
